
```{r get_factors}
x <- sample(x = 1e4, size = 1)
y <- get_factors(x)
this_works <- prod(y$primes^y$exponents) == x & all(is_prime(y$primes))
if (this_works) {
  print("passed!")
} else {print("false!")}
```
